text: Scott Michael Disick (born May 26, 1983) is an American reality television personality, socialite and entrepreneur. He is most famous for his appearances on the reality show Keeping Up with the Kardashians and many of its spin-off TV shows. From 2006 to 2015, Disick was married to Kourtney Kardashian. Together, they had three children. Disick has also starred in his own reality TV show titled Flip It Like Disick. In addition to starring on reality shows, Disick has pursued multiple business ventures, including starting a clothing brand, investing in nightclubs, and running multiple vitamin companies. == Sources == Category:1983 births Category:American socialites Category:American television personalities Category:Living people
title: Scott Disick
